data.persona: I am the king and rule over the land. The people respect and honor me. I live in a large castle with many servants.
data.description:
You are in the Beach House.
A marvelous beach house that sits upon the fine white sand of the beach. It looks mighty expensive, as the house has solid gold walls. A gigantic and lavish marble pier extends into the ocean out in front of the house.
There's a wall, a palm tree, a the beach, a clam, a A gigantic and lavish marble pier, an ocean, a fine white sand, a sand, a the ocean, a pier, and a beach here.
The the king is here.

You are carrying a crown, and wearing a belt and a robe.

data.short_motivation: I order a servant to get the clam.
data.mid_motivation: I am preparing a seafood feast for my loyal subjects.
data.long_motivation: I need to improve morale amongst my people.
